channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 09:14 Auxiliary in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirovsk territorial community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 09:14 Auxiliary in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirovsk territorial community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
